event.title: COUPLE OF.?Except odor
event.description:
A SINGLE.?Dust removal
The biggest function of the? air purifier? is to remove dust and also absorb the suspended dust in the air, which can effectively clear away dust, ash, pollen and other particles while in the room. The room with the air purifier has less dust and does not feel dirty. The purifier is a great product for people who are sensitive to dusty nasal cavity
?
COUPLE OF.?Except odor
The air purifier can effectively remove the smell from the room, the smell of smoke, the smell of new household decoration, the taste of fixtures, and the odor of spicy food like hot pot can be quickly cleaned and removed from the air purifier, which can retain the smell of indoor cleanup.
?
3.?Sterilization
Air purifiers? have a certain sterilization effect. Various brands of air purifiers have different sterilization principles, mainly by adsorbing and decomposing harmful substances such as bacteria, allergens, and germs while in the air to improve air personal hygiene.
?
4. Eliminate formaldehyde
The effect of air purifiers to eliminate formaldehyde is a most concerned part of customers. The formaldehyde in new buildings closely affects people’s lives. Most of the time, the release of formaldehyde is related to the decoration materials. The method of combining air purifiers with window ventilation is usually to compare The ideal way in order to eliminate formaldehyde.
